description:
A shady lender offers Honeyguide a more permanent solution to his money problems, while Caracal, Lion, and Ratel attend a sketchy speed-dating event.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Africa Loan Sharks / Africa Speed Dating / Africa High-School Girls: Africa Town Mixers
Africa no Yamikin-kun / Africa no Konkatsu / Africa no JK: Africa no Machicon
アフリカの闇金くん / アフリカの婚活 / アフリカのJK~アフリカの街コン~
